Warning

The Backup Tool plugin has detected that you're attempting to generate a backup on a Windows-based server.

While the plugin may work without issues, on some Windows-based servers, Backup Tool may fail to access some file paths or may fail to create an archive.

Please note that running Backup Tool on a Windows-based server is unsupported, and that the author of the plugin will not provide technical support for this.

If you have read the above statement and wish to continue, please press the “I Understand” button below.
